entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and flurries changing to a few flurries near midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 7:55 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:55 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 7:55 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
